name: Mind Donor
description:
A very green game about creating a monster.

You take the role of Victoria Frankenstein as she ventures her lab, collecting the pieces to finish her creation. As you do so, you'll soon find out the motive for her research.

Mind Donor is a prequel/proof of concept for a much more fleshed out game that may come in the future. It all depends on public interest.

If you donate just £1, you'll get access to a small collection of concept art and the image files used in cutscenes as a thank you! All I ask is that you keep these images to yourself and don't share them online.
